variants.Description in input context: <description of variant as provided in the literature>

Described Disease.Described Disease: <disease name as provided in the literature>

Experiment Method.Assay Method: <assay method as provided in the literature>
Experiment Method.Readout type: <type of readout, e.g., quantitative or qualitative>

Readout description.Variant: <HGVS nomenclature for the variant under consideration>
Readout description.Conclusion: <conclusion about the variant, e.g., abnormal or normal>
Readout description.Molecular Effect: <molecular effect of the variant, e.g., complete loss-of-function or partial loss-of-function>
Readout description.Result Description: <description of the experimental result for this specific variant>

Biological replicates.Biological replicates: <whether biological replicate experiments were performed, e.g., Yes, No or N.D.>

Technical replicates.Technical replicates: <whether technical replicate experiments were performed, e.g., Yes, No or N.D.>

Basic positive control.Basic positive control: <whether a basic positive control was set up, e.g., Yes, No or N.D.>

Basic negative control.Basic negative control: <whether a basic negative control was set up, e.g., Yes, No or N.D.>

Validation controls P/LP.Validation controls P/LP: <whether validation controls for pathogenic or likely pathogenic variants were included, e.g., Yes, No or N.D.>

Validation controls B/LB.Validation controls B/LB: <whether validation controls for benign or likely benign variants were included, e.g., Yes, No or N.D.>

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: <description of the statistical analysis method used in the experimental protocol>

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: <threshold for normal results, e.g., 'Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.'>
Threshold for normal readout.Source: <source of the threshold, e.g., Literature or Custom>

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: <threshold for abnormal results, e.g., 'Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.'>
Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: <source of the threshold, e.g., Literature or Custom>

Approved assay.Approved assay: <whether the experimental protocol used in the literature is generally used for studying this disease, e.g., Yes, No or N.D.>
